author: rhuijben
msg: (JNIUtil::JNIGlobalInit): As a shared library inside the java runtime
we shouldn't set the default localization textdomain.
(As a library we use an explicit domain in every gettext call).

author: rhuijben
msg: (generator.write_project): Following up on r32012, also use utility projects
for java compilation, to fix the Javahl build on VS2008.
